snippet: Delegates agreed to extend the increasingly ineffective Kyoto Protocol and other unspecified actions to reduce emissions of climate-altering gases.
abstract: Annual United Nations climate change negotiations conclude in Qatar after all-night negotiating session and recriminations over who must bear costs and burdens of warming planet; delegates agree to extend increasingly ineffective Kyoto Protocol and commit to more ambitious but unspecified actions to reduce emissions of climate-altering gases.
lead_paragraph: Delegates agreed to extend the increasingly ineffective Kyoto Protocol and other unspecified actions to reduce emissions of climate-altering gases.

headline.main: Climate Talks Yield Commitment to Ambitious, but Unclear, Actions
headline.print_headline: Climate Talks Yield Commitment to Ambitious, but Unclear, Actions

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
keywords.name: subject
